title: The Bone Grove
description: "The small town of Tulina is rocked by a series of gruesome murders. Two hunters are hired in desperation once it's discovered the culprit is a vampire. Nadie, an experienced adventurer and a professionally trained but untested monster hunter named Renald must search for clues to find and stop the vampire before it strikes again. Tulina and the ancient forest that surrounds it are full of mysteries, but the secrets the two hunters keep from each other may prove even more dangerous."
author: Monday Tieger
